headline: Amazon, Ford Partner on Used Cars. 4 Stocks That Could Be Impacted.
summary: Amazon  com, with its penchant for disrupting retail industries, is going after the used car business with the help of  Ford Motor  That could be bad news for  CarGurus Cars.com CarMax  and  Carvana  though they weren’t really acting like it, for the most part.  Monday, Ford Motor and Amazon announced that car buyers can shop for certified preowned Ford vehicles on Amazon Autos.  Amazon launched its car buying platform in late 2024, partnering with  Hyundai Motor  Hertz was Amazon Autos’ first fleet customer.

headline: Skip the dealership and buy a used Ford on Amazon: What to know
summary: Amazon (AMZN) and Ford (F) are teaming up to offer certified used vehicles from dealerships through the e-commerce giant's new Amazon Autos site. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian outlines the details on Market Domination Overtime. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: Peter Thiel's hedge fund sells Nvidia stake, Ford-Amazon partnership
summary: Yahoo Finance's John Hyland tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Stifel analysts boosting their price target on Tesla (TSLA) stock, Peter Thiel's hedge fund Thiel Macro fund sold off the entirety of its Nvidia (NVDA) stake, and Amazon (AMZN) partnering with Ford (F) to sell pre-owned cars online. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: EV Sales Are Slowing. Why This Lithium Producer’s Stock Is on Fire.
summary: Electric-vehicle sales are slowing in the U.S. as the Trump administration cuts support for the transportation technology fueled by lithium-ion batteries.  Albemarle  stock is rising anyway.  Albemarle stock was up 8.2% in midday trading on Monday, while the  was up 0.1% and the  was flat.

headline: Wall Street Is in Love With Ford
summary: After years of being dogged by a poor stock price, Ford shares are up sharply this year. Investors are pleased with the automaker's retreat from electric vehicles.

headline: Ford Teams Up With Amazon to Sell Certified Used Cars Online
summary: Ford Motor Co. has struck a deal to sell certified used cars through Amazon.com Inc. Ford becomes the second automaker on the Amazon Autos portal, which allows car buyers to browse, finance and purchase a used car. Keith Naughton reports on Bloomberg Television.

raw.headline: Ford Teams Up With Amazon to Sell Certified Used Cars Online

headline: Carvana and CarMax stock falls after Ford partners with Amazon
summary: Investing.com -- Carvana (NYSE:CVNA) stock fell 2.6% and CarMax (NYSE:KMX) stock dropped 1.7% on Monday after Ford Motor (NYSE:F) announced a partnership with Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) to sell certified used vehicles through the e-commerce giant’s platform.

raw.headline: Carvana and CarMax stock falls after Ford partners with Amazon
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Carvana (NYSE:CVNA) stock fell 2.6% and CarMax (NYSE:KMX) stock dropped 1.7% on Monday after Ford Motor (NYSE:F) announced a partnership with Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) to sell certified used vehicles through the e-commerce giant’s platform.

headline: Ford Taps Amazon to Let Shoppers Buy Its Used Cars Online
summary: Ford joins Hyundai Motor Co. on the Amazon Autos portal, which allows car buyers to browse, finance and purchase a used car by clicking on the familiar “add to cart” icon.  Hyundai began selling new cars through the platform late last year, but Ford is only offering its “Blue Advantage” certified used cars on the site, the second-largest US automaker said Monday in a statement.  Car buyers will take delivery of their vehicles through Ford dealers participating in the program.

Car buyers will take delivery of their vehicles through Ford dealers participating in the program.

summary: GM's rising software revenues and raised 2025 guidance bode well, while Ford trims its outlook amid supply disruptions.

headline: Electric vehicle sales are booming in South America — without Tesla
summary: MONTEVIDEO/LIMA (Reuters) -When Peruvian green energy entrepreneur Luis Zwiebach wanted to buy an electric vehicle in 2019, he flew 4,000 miles to California to test drive Tesla’s Model 3 sedan.  “There was a gentleman who had already imported one and wanted to sell it,” Zwiebach said.  Charging the Tesla initially proved difficult at his friend’s beach house outside Lima.

headline: Ford partners with Amazon for dealers to sell used vehicles online
summary: Ford is partnering with Amazon for the automaker's franchised dealers to be able to sell certified pre-owned vehicles through the online retail giant.
